item.title: code fix (bug FOR-564)
item.description:
code fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-564)
:
Use the value "current" for the releaseNotes_* URI or specify a version number, i.e. show what is new for the latest release. Thanks to Cyriaque Dupoirieux.

item.title: docs add
item.description:
docs add by RDG :
Basic documentation on how to create release notes are now included on the plugins documentation index page.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Added automatic generation of release notes by requesting **/releaseNotes_VERSION-NUMBER.xml

item.title: design add
item.description:
design add by RDG :
Added optional "notes" element to "release" element of status 1.3 DTD. This will be inserted into the release notes for that version.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Enable the generation of changes for a specific version by requesting **/changes_VERSION-NUMBER.xml

item.title: docs fix
item.description:
docs fix by DC :
Use relative location of images directory.

item.title: design add
item.description:
design add by DC :
Added better sitemap match using regexp to deal with sub-directories too.

item.title: code fix
item.description:
code fix by DC :
Replace use of document() function in changes2rss.xml with sitemap aggregation.

item.title: code fix (bug FOR-455)
item.description:
code fix by DC (fixes bug FOR-455)
:
Use the "title" attribute of "changes" and "todo" tags if it exists, otherwise use the hard-coded values. Thanks to Cyriaque Dupoirieux.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
Move ToDo and Changes pipelines to this plugin, from core.

item.title: admin add
item.description:
admin add by RDG :
Initial plugin code.
